Name: Monster Crush - C4 Demolition Edition
About the game: MONSTER CRUSH C4 DEMOLITION EDITION is the long awaited HD remake from the IOS hit game. This version was build for PC from the ground up, with new and improved graphics and includes all the bonus levels and materials! Monster Crush is a physics based puzzle game that puts you in the role of a demolition expert. Alien Monsters have invaded the planet. Our weapons are useless. There is only one way of stopping them: Crush them with our skyscrapers! Plant your bombs in the tallest buildings and watch them fall on the invaders. 7 cities to liberate 42 unique puzzle levels 20000+ user contributed levels 2 types of bombs: 1- The Black Bomb: Makes a nice round hole in a building but can only destroy soft materials like bricks and concrete. 2- The Cutter: Slices a piece off the building. Can cut through heavy steel. Multiple puzzle game modes: 1- Bowling: Get a wrecking ball as far as possible. 2- Crush Monsters: Try to crush all monsters. 3- Girder Construction: Make constructions to guide the wrecking ball. 4- Demolition: Blow as much up as possible using high explosives. 5- Limbo Dancing: Get the building below a certain level. The game uses advanced physics to simulate the destruction. Games like 'Angry Birds' and 'Implode' use only stacked boxes. Now whole buildings can collapse to the ground. Windows will break and dust will fill the sky!
